entry.title: ACROSS THE BROKEN WORLDS
entry.summary:
Author: GoddessOfMischief61

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,249Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Who knew that what he had been searching for all his life would come from another universe?He had thought himself above such things above yearning, above weakness, above the gnawing ache of loneliness that crept in during the quiet hours of the night. He had forged himself into a weapon, a blade honed by shadows and sharpened by blood. But blades, no matter how flawless, still break.Then he saw him.Dick Grayson but not his Dick. Older, worn by battles Damian had never fought, softened by joy. Damian had never known. A man who carried light even through scars. It was infuriating. It was intoxicating. It was everything Damian had never allowed himself to want.
